name: 30-50 Feral Hogs (itch)
description:
Legit question for rural Americans - How do I kill the 30-50 feral hogs that run into my yard within 3-5 mins while my small kids play?

Here's your answer William.

(WASD to Move, Space to Shoot)

This game was made in 20 hours. Don't make a game by yourself in 20 hours.

Thank you to Gene Park for the investment.
Share the game on twitter and follow me @book81able. 

If you have an itch account please give the game a rating. Even if it's one star, at least I'll know you don't like memes.

Please consider donating 3-5 of your own feral hogs ($). Interactive memes take a lot of work.

Democracy Dies in 3-5 Minutes while small kids play
